episode: A couple years ago we had a large severe storm sweep through our area. It was terrifying.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: hello

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: How are you today?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: A couple years ago we had a large severe storm sweep through our area. It was terrifying.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds intense, what happened during the storm?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: We had very severe winds and large hail. It was very scary. Luckily, the damage to our house was minimal

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Glad to hear that, must have been a huge relief.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes it was. You could feel our house shaking

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That must have been unsettling.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes it was

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I can imagine, it's frightening when your home feels vulnerable.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes it is a very unsettling feeling. Luckily everything turned out okay

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Thank goodness, that's all that matters.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: absolutely. And nobody was hurt

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's the most important thing.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes. You can always buy a new house

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: But you can't replace people.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: exaclty

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Material things can be replaced, but not lives.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes. Health is everything. Material possessions come and go

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Wise words, health is truly priceless.
